snippet: An invite to a 1968 mega-concert helped Jim Cummins land a gig shooting hundreds of album covers, back when covers were a big deal, and record companies spared no expense.
abstract: An invite to a 1968 mega-concert helped Jim Cummins land a gig shooting hundreds of album covers, back when covers were a big deal, and record companies spared no expense.

headline.main: Picturing Jimi, Janis, Miles and Duke
